name: Teddy vs Zombies
description:
In game we control a teddy which must defend yourself in appointed time against coming zombies. Weapons are falling from above and thanks to them we can liquidate enemies. You will find here 9 weapons, 5 types of zombies and 5 levels that have different difficulty and graphics. Every (level) is divided into 3 modes:
Normal, Survival, Time.

Teddy vs Zombies is first game that I created. Every testing and opinions are welcomed, those will help me improve my future projects. My greets and have a nice game :).
